sub_title: Senior Software Development Manager - AWS (Ex Booking.com)
summary:
With over 10 years of software engineering experience, I am an engineering leader at Amazon Web Services (AWS), where I lead the development of multiple products and platforms that enhance the customer experience within AWS services. I have a strong background in Java, XML, Web Services, data warehouse, tax, and fintech domains, and I hold multiple certifications from Oracle and IBM.

I manage teams of talented engineers, data engineers, business intelligence engineers, and technical product managers who are responsible for building and maintaining solutions that comply with global tax regulations, enable data ingestion and quality control, and provide reporting and monitoring features. I also oversee the development of the AWS Cloud9 Service, the IDE Widget on CodeCatalyst IDEs, and the CloudEditor, which target external and internal customers across all AWS Consoles. I am passionate about delivering high-quality and high-performance solutions that meet the needs and expectations of our customers. I foster a culture of collaboration, innovation, and continuous improvement within my teams, and I partner with other teams and stakeholders across AWS to ensure alignment and integration of our products and platforms. My goal is to empower my teams and customers with the best tools and practices to build and run their services on AWS.

profile_positions.description: Leading teams that are responsibilities involve overseeing the development of multiple products with a focus on enhancing the customer experience within AWS services. Among these products, two are specifically designed to serve external customers, namely the AWS Cloud9 Service and the IDE Widget on CodeCatalyst IDEs. In addition, I am leading the development of the CloudEditor, which targets all AWS Consoles
profile_positions.title: Engineering Leader, Amazon

profile_positions.description:
Managing multiple tax and data warehouse teams of data engineers, software developers, business intelligence engineer, and technical product managers.
Teams are responsible for:
- Data ingestion, quality controls, including data compaction and completeness from various complex Amazon internal systems/products into our massive tax/accounting data warehouse platform.
- On top of our data warehouse platform, we build platforms and other reporting solutions to enable business to comply with the mandatory tax regulations globally. 
- Work on strategic platform initiatives that reduce the time required to make rule changes for new tax regulations and business launches in the future.
profile_positions.title: Manager III, Software Development - Fintech

profile_positions.description:
Manage, lead, and mentor infrastructure team in developer experience track that is responsible for building an internal ecosystem in Java stack to help and facilitate building business services (serving over 800 production service) on internal bare-metal servers and our hybrid container infrastructure. 
We provide the tools to communicate with Booking infrastructure and provide features like monitor, logs, events, needed Kubernetes templates, Helm charts, and Java docker images to manage the lifecycle of these business services and measuring code quality using Sonarqube.

Key Responsibilities:
- Focusing on the quality metrics and performance of our components. 
- Manages retrospectives, backlog, sprint planning, and defining the team’s objectives/milestones.
- Holds and leading the recurring meeting with our stakeholders and product managers discussing our long-term planning, progress, challenges, and priorities of the deliverables.
- Leading track wise initiatives.
- Provide needed support technically and for the personal growth of my team members while holding regular 1on1s.
- Responsible for team performance and calibration and hiring good talent for the teams.
profile_positions.title: Engineering Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Building and managing Helm charts defined for our applications along with available/needed sidecars.
- Building various Booking libraries that work at high scale with our microservices. 
- Building and maintaining Continous Integration pipelines to ensure reliability across different components.
-  Ensuring the success of Java services for Containersed applications using our internal built-in deployment tools to facilitate multi-cluster deployment for Kubernetes that hosted inhouse or in AWS Cloud. Same thing for bare-metal as well
- Manages SonarQube to ensure quality and standards of our Java code at Booking
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
Part of backend team who is responsible for developing different frameworks and engines for games which in turn published to our portals in addition to other providers like Facebook, line, ..etc. 
These toolkit and backend engines are built to high scale to be efficient, fast and reliable using the powerful asynchronous PlayFramework armed with Akka toolkit for more reliable reactive systems, Amazon AWS, S3, Cassandra, RedisDB, ElasticSearch...etc.
profile_positions.title: Senior Backend Developer – Java

profile_positions.description:
Selected Projects:
•	Develop system for legal affairs department at Border Guard. The system automates the workflow and stores cases managed by the department.
o	Technologies: JEE, JSF2.1, PrimeFaces, WrapBootStrap, RESTful web services, Hibernate and Oracle Database 11g, Web Logic application server.
o	Role: System Designer and Senior Software Engineer.

•	Develop system for military intelligence department at Border Guard. The system manages communication with agents and storing information in the system.
o	Technologies: JEE, JSF2.1, PrimeFaces, WrapBootStrap, RESTful web services, Hibernate and Oracle Database 11g, Web Logic application server.
o	Role: System Designer and Senior Software Engineer.

•	Develop airline reservation system for Saudi Border Guard. The system’s architecture solved the challenge of seat selections and reservation management across clustered environment with high availability. Using Dijkstra’s algorithm implied efficient and faster searching for optimal path for travelers.
o	Technologies: JEE, JSF2.1, RichFaces4, Hibernate and Oracle Database 11g, Web Logic application server.
o	Role: Business Analyst, System Designer and Senior Software Engineer.
